debates.showAs: Protection of Retail Workers Bill 2025: Second Stage
Protection of Retail Workers Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Criminal Justice (Public Order) Act 1994 to create specific offences for assaulting or threatening retail workers carrying out their employment.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Cheartas Coiriúil (Ord Poiblí), 1994 chun cionta sonracha a chruthú arb éard iad ionsaí nó bagairt a dhéanamh ar oibrithe miondíola atá ag gabháil dá bhfostaíocht.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Oibrithe Miondíola a Chosaint, 2025

debates.showAs: Health (Postponement of Certain Leave) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Maternity Protection Act 1994 and the Adoptive Leave Act 1995 and for those purposes to provide a mechanism to postpone maternity leave or adoptive leave in circumstances where a person is diagnosed with or being treated for cancer and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú an Achta um Chosaint Mháithreachais, 1994 agus an Achta um Shaoire Uchtaíoch, 1995 agus chun na gcríoch sin do sholáthar sásra chun saoire mháithreachais nó saoire uchtaíoch a iarchur in imthosca ina bhfáthmheastar go bhfuil ailse ar dhuine nó ina bhfuil cóireáil in aghaidh ailse á cur ar dhuine agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Sláinte (Saoire Áirithe a Iarchur), 2024

debates.showAs: Curragh of Kildare (Amendment) Bill 2022: Second Stage
Curragh of Kildare (Amendment) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Curragh of Kildare Act 1961 to make provision for the management and use of the Curragh whereby the Minister may grant a licence to persons for continuous occupation of any part of the Curragh for a specified period of time, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht Churrach Chill Dara, 1961 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le bainistiú agus le húsáid an Churraigh trína bhféadfaidh an tAire ceadúnas a dheonú do dhaoine chun aon chuid den Churrach a áitiú go leanúnach ar feadh tréimhse shonraithe ama, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Horticultural Peat (Temporary Measures) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Horticultural Peat (Temporary Measures) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Acts 2000 to 2021 and the Environmental Protection Agency Acts 1992 to 2011 to make exceptional provision for peat extraction for the purpose of horticulture for a temporary period in the public interest in order to mitigate the adverse consequences resulting, or likely to result from an interruption to supply and to provide for a just transition.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na nAchtanna um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 go 2021 agus na nAchtanna fán nGníomhaireacht um Chaomhnú Comhshaoil, 1992 go 2011 chun socrú eisceachtúil a dhéanamh maidir le baint móna chun críche gairneoireachta ar feadh tréimhse shealadach ar mhaithe le leas an phobail d’fhonn maolú a dhéanamh ar na hiarmhairtí dochracha a bheidh, nó is dóigh a bheidh, mar thoradh ar bhriseadh ar sholáthar agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le trasdul cóir.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Móin Ghairneoireachta (Bearta Sealadacha), 2021

debates.showAs: Non-Fatal Offences Against the Person (Amendment) (Stalking) Bill 2021: Report and Final Stages
Non-Fatal Offences Against the Person (Amendment) (Stalking) Bill 2021: Committee Stage
Non-Fatal Offences Against the Person (Amendment) (Stalking) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Non-Fatal Offences Against the Person (Amendment) (Stalking) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for a specific offence of stalking characterised by repeated, unwanted behaviour that occurs as a result of fixation or obsession and causes alarm, distress or harm to the victim and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cion sonrach arb éard é stalcaireacht, arb é an phríomhthréith a ghabhann léi iompar gan iarraidh, arís agus arís eile, a tharlaíonn mar thoradh ar ghreamú nó dúghabháil, agus ar cúis é le scaoll a chur san íospartach, anó a chur air nó uirthi nó díobháil a dhéanamh dó nó di agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Non-Fatal Offences Against the Person (Amendment) (Stalking) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chionta Neamh-Mharfacha in aghaidh an Duine (Leasú) (Stalcaireacht), 2021

debates.showAs: Clean Air (Smoky Coal Ban) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the introduction of regulations to prohibit the sale, marketing, distribution and burning of bituminous (smoky) coal on a nationwide basis; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le rialacháin a thabhairt isteach do thoirmeasc gual biotúmanach (toiteach) a dhíol, a mhargú, a dháileadh agus a dhó, ar bhonn náisiúnta; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Aer Glan (Cosc ar Ghual Toiteach), 2021

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to reduce to sixteen years the age at which a person is entitled to be registered as a European Parliament and local government elector, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do laghdú go dtí sé bliana déag an aois ag a mbeidh duine i dteideal a bheith cláraithe mar thoghthóir do Pharlaimint na hEorpa agus mar thoghthóir rialtais áitiúil, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Free Provision of Period Products Bill 2021: Second Stage
Free Provision of Period Products Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to secure the Provision of free period products.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun soláthar táirgí míosta saor in aisce a áirithiú.
bill.shortTitleEn: Free Provision of Period Products Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Tháirgí Míosta a Sholáthar Saor in Aisce, 2021
